The talented Mia Wasikowska stars alongside Hayley Atwell, Jane Adams, and Rufus Sewell in this poignant drama.

If that doesn't strike your fancy, I'd be happy to recommend another title from the list!

Considering you didn't expect the vibe of Hart's War, I'd recommend Man on Wire (2008) instead. It's a fascinating documentary that tells an incredible true story of Philippe Petit's high-wire walk between the Twin Towers in 1974. You'll be captivated by the thrilling visuals and Petit's unwavering passion!

If you're looking for something more intense, I'd suggest xXx (2002) instead! It's an action-packed adventure starring Vin Diesel and Eve, with a plot that'll keep you on the edge of your seat.
